summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1979, for the improvement of Ferdinand Street, in the City of Seattle, from Forty-ninth Avenue South to Lake Avenue, by the laying of water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees and other appurtenances for the proper water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 20384, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
